text: Pedro Antonio de Alarcón (10 March 1833 – 19 July 1891) was a Spanish writer. He was born in Guadix, near Granada. He was a 19th century novelist. He gained his first literary recognition with A Witness' Diary of the African War (1859-1860), a patriotic account of the campaign. Category:Spanish writers Category:1833 births Category:1891 deaths
title: Pedro Antonio de Alarcón
